cells.data:
Got some useful info -- (almost) every deploy has an associated PROD ticket type patch -- so you can get a look at what deployments (not releases!) are coming up here: https://jira.brightcove.com/issues/?jql=project%20%3D%20PROD%20AND%20resolution%20%3D%20Unresolved%2...
and of course you can add yourself as a watcher to tickets of interest
